There are instructions for setting up a Wayback instance here:

https://web=
archive.jira.com/wiki/display/wayback/Wayback+Installation+and+Configuratio=
n+Guide

Although please note my comment at the bottom of the page about Wa=
yback/JVM version compatibility.

Best wishes,
Andy Jackson
